item.name: Home
item.description: Simple, humble and nutritious describes this dish perfectly! Greens combine with beans and rice for a nutritional powerhouse. I named this very simple and humble dish of rice, beans, and greens for one of my favorite Supreme Court Justices, Justice Ruth Bader Ginsberg. I think it’s very telling and NOT a coincidence that her initials […]
